scripts.demo-start: npm run demo-build-copy && budo demo/src/javascripts/main.js:main.min.js --dir dist-demo/ --open -- -t babelify -t sassify -t brfs-babel
scripts.demo-build: npm run demo-build-clean && npm run demo-build-copy && npm run demo-build-script
scripts.demo-build-copy: mkdir -p dist-demo/docs && cp -R demo/src/static/* dist-demo/ && cp -R docs dist-demo
scripts.demo-build-script: NODE_ENV=production browserify demo/src/javascripts/main.js -o -t babelify -t sassify -t brfs-babel | uglifyjs > dist-demo/main.min.js
scripts.demo-gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix dist-demo origin gh-pages
scripts.demo-gh-pages-force: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist-demo master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.demo-publish: npm run build && npm run demo-build && git add dist-demo -f && git commit -m 'UPDATE DOCS' --no-verify && npm run demo-gh-pages
scripts.demo-publish-force: npm run build && npm run demo-build && git add dist-demo -f && git commit -m 'UPDATE DOCS' --no-verify && npm run demo-gh-pages-force
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build-dist && npm run test-headless
scripts.test-fast: npm run lint && npm run test-node
scripts.test-shader: npm run build-dist && budo src/test/fp64-shader.spec.js:build/test-bundle.js --dir test --live --open --port 3001 --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,scss,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t brfs-babel
